=== About me ===

 I am the Core Member of Ubuntu Myanmar LoCo Team.I'm Buddhist, I live in Yangon(Rangoon) Myanmar(Burma).I have been used Linux since 2009, Ubuntu being my main choice. I start to tried 9.04, 9.10, 10.04, 10.10 .I Only tell about the ubuntu problem when we met at teashop and alway tell what can we do for more locolization to other divisions of the country.

=== Goals ===
==== Life Goals ====
I want to learn more in Networking, and learn bug fixing and applying patches, also I hope to be an Ubuntu developer.

I'm using Linux since I was 2011, as well as I have a poor knowledge in Linux.

I am an active member and Co Member of our native loco team (Ubuntu-mm).

==== Future Goal ====
learn Python well. 

Become an Ubuntu member. 

Help Our team become an re-approved Lo Co team .
Because I am proud of Ubuntu Myanmar Lo Co Team and Burmese, Burmese Translation Team

Share to our community Fix bugs and apply patches. 

Become an Ubuntu developer.

Become a LPI.

Become Ubuntu Myanmar LoCo Team with Ubuntu Member / Ubuntu Developer.
